attributes.action: Insist that Nigel FARAGE is leader of the UK Trade Negotiation Team
attributes.additional_details: It would appear that the Politicians are preparing to STITCH up the British people  again. We did NOT vote to Leave, only for the Politicians, to take us back. Since we have left many Countries are lining up to Trade with us. The Old Commonwealth, China, India, America. We do not need the Single Market. They need us. It is not for us to go to them, with a deal. It is for them to come to us. Mr Farage will ensure we are not STITCHED up. He will let the British People know what is going on.
attributes.background: Since the British people have decided to LEAVE the EU and the Single Market, we have heard nothing but Politician, saying how we need to get the closest links and the best deal we can for the UK. The BEST deal will the away from the Single Market and the man to Lead it is NIGEL FARAGE.
